Index.title: Persona Studio
Index.subtitle: Bring your manga stories to life with the power of AI.

StoryFoundation.title: 1. Story Foundation
StoryFoundation.description: Define your idea, or let AI inspire you, then generate a detailed plan.
StoryFoundation.inspireDescription: Enter some of your ideas, keywords, or story snippets here. This helps generate story and style that better match your expectations. If left blank, we'll give you a completely random inspiration.
StoryFoundation.inspirePlaceholder: e.g., A detective story in a cyberpunk setting, with a cat-eared robot as the protagonist...
StoryFoundation.provideSummaryError: Please provide a story summary first.
StoryFoundation.errorUploadFirst: Please upload a reference image first.
StoryFoundation.infoAnalyzing: Analyzing art style from the image...
StoryFoundation.errorArtStyleFailed: Failed to generate art style description.
StoryFoundation.corePlanCreated: Core plan created, now generating page breakdown...

AssetCreator.title: 2. Create Assets
AssetCreator.description: Generate the characters and environments from your plan.
AssetCreator.selectAssetPlaceholder: Select an asset from the plan
AssetCreator.name: Name
AssetCreator.characterPromptPlaceholder: e.g., A stoic samurai with a scar over his left eye, wearing traditional dark blue robes.
AssetCreator.environmentPromptPlaceholder: e.g., A bustling futuristic city market at night, neon signs reflecting in puddles on the street.
AssetCreator.errorPlanFirst: Please generate a story plan first for smart suggestions.
AssetCreator.errorNameAndPrompt: Please provide a name and a prompt.
AssetCreator.errorNameFirst: Please select or enter a name first.

AssetList.noAssets: No {assetType, select, characters {characters} environments {environments} other {assets}} created yet.
AssetList.cannotDeleteSelectedImage: Cannot delete the currently selected final image.

PageGenerator.title: 3. Generate Pages
PageGenerator.description: Generate pages panel by panel using your story plan.
PageGenerator.promptPlaceholder: e.g., Kenji stands defiantly in the Neo-Kyoto Market, facing off against a shadowy figure. Rain pours down.
PageGenerator.noAssets: Go to "2. Create Assets" to generate characters and environments first.
PageGenerator.errorPlanFirst: Please generate a story plan first for smart suggestions.
PageGenerator.infoGeneratingSuggestion: Generating a suggestion for the next page...
PageGenerator.errorPrompt: Please provide a prompt for the page.
PageGenerator.infoGeneratingPage: Generating page {pageNumber}... This may take a moment.
PageGenerator.noOutline: No outline available for this page.
PageGenerator.errorLastPanel: You must have at least one panel.
PageGenerator.layoutPlaceholder: Describe how the panels are arranged on the page...

MangaViewer.title: Manga Viewer
MangaViewer.description: Use the arrows to navigate between pages.
MangaViewer.noPages: Your generated manga will appear here.
MangaViewer.pageNotGenerated: Page {pageNumber} has not been generated yet.
MangaViewer.packagingInProgress: Packaging your manga into a ZIP file...
MangaViewer.packagingSuccess: Your manga has been packaged successfully!
MangaViewer.cannotDeleteSelectedImage: Cannot delete the currently selected final image.

HowToUseGuide.title: How to Use Persona Studio
HowToUseGuide.description: Follow these steps to create your own AI-powered manga.
HowToUseGuide.step1Intro: This is where your idea begins. You have a few ways to set up your story:
HowToUseGuide.step1Option1: Manual Creation: Personally select a genre, color style, and write your own story summary.
HowToUseGuide.step1Option2: Visual Art Style: Instead of describing an art style, you can upload a reference image. The AI will analyze it and automatically generate a detailed art style description for you.
HowToUseGuide.step1Option3: Full AI Inspiration: Click the Inspire Me (✨) button to have the AI generate a unique, fun idea and fill in all the fields for you.
HowToUseGuide.step1Outro: Once you have an idea you like, select the number of pages and click Make Plan. The AI will expand your idea into a detailed, editable plan with character descriptions, environments, and a page-by-page plot.
HowToUseGuide.step2Intro: Bring your story's cast and world to life.
HowToUseGuide.step2Option1: The Inspire Me (✨) button here is context-aware! It will look at your story plan and suggest the next un-created character or environment, generating a professional prompt for it.
HowToUseGuide.step2Option2: Click Generate to create the asset. The AI will use your detailed art style to ensure consistency.
HowToUseGuide.step3Intro: This is where you create the manga itself.
HowToUseGuide.step3Option1: The Inspire Me (✨) button here is incredibly smart. It reads your story plan and the content of previous pages to write a detailed, panel-by-panel prompt for the very next page, ensuring the story flows logically.
HowToUseGuide.step3Option2: Select the characters and environments that appear on this page. Then click Generate Page.
HowToUseGuide.step3Option3: The AI uses all available information—previous pages, asset references, and your prompt—to create a visually consistent new page.
HowToUseGuide.step4Intro: Your generated pages will appear in the "Your Manga" viewer. This is your interactive canvas.
HowToUseGuide.step4Option1: Click any page to open a detailed view.
HowToUseGuide.step4Option2: Here you can View Full image, Download it, or Edit Prompt.
HowToUseGuide.step4Option3: Editing and clicking Regenerate will re-create the page using your new instructions while maintaining continuity with previous pages.
HowToUseGuide.step4Option4: Use the header buttons to Remove the Last Page or Start Over completely.

ImageUploader.fileRejected: Invalid file. Please make sure it's an image.
ImageUploader.dragOrClick: Drag 'n' drop an image here, or click to select a file

ResetDialog.title: Are you sure you want to reset the project?
ResetDialog.description: This will clear all project data, including story, characters, and pages. This action cannot be undone.

ImageFinetuneModal.title: Image Finetuning
ImageFinetuneModal.confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this historical image? This action cannot be undone.
